start.name: Protagonist
start.text: The morning sunlight streams through the classroom windows, illuminating the familiar scent of chalk and textbooks. Another school day begins. You can feel the hum of chatter and the soft shuffle of shoes in the hallway. Do you head straight to class, skip it, or explore the rooftop where the wind always feels different?

classroom_1.name: Teacher
classroom_1.text: You enter the classroom, and the familiar face of your teacher greets you. "Good morning! Are you ready for today’s pop quiz?" The desks are neatly arranged. Your friends glance at you, waiting to see if you'll act casual or stressed.

quiz_1.name: Narrator
quiz_1.text: You take a deep breath and focus, letting the knowledge from late-night studying guide your answers. When the teacher collects the quizzes, you feel a warm sense of pride swell inside you. The bell rings, and you leave the room feeling accomplished.

quiz_cheat_1.name: Narrator
quiz_cheat_1.text: You sneak a glance at your neighbor's paper. Just as you write one down, a sharp tap on your shoulder startles you. The teacher is staring at you, disappointment etched across her face. You are sent to detention.

skip_school_1.name: Friend
skip_school_1.text: The streets outside are quiet as you slip past the school gates. Your friend spots you near the park entrance and waves, smiling knowingly. "Hey, you skipped class again! Want to grab a snack?"

snack_1.name: Friend
snack_1.text: The café is warm, a gentle aroma of coffee and pastries filling the space. You share stories, small confessions, and the feeling of freedom. Every bite seems to taste better with this rare quiet moment.

wander_1.name: Narrator
wander_1.text: You walk along the winding paths of the park, the leaves rustling softly beneath your feet. Finding a quiet spot by the fountain, you pause. It's peaceful, and you feel strangely content, appreciating the solitude and the freedom of your choices today.

chat_school_1.name: Friend
chat_school_1.text: Talking about school makes you realize how much you’ve fallen behind. Your friend offers advice. You make a plan together to catch up later, and despite skipping class, you feel responsible and motivated.

chat_hobbies_1.name: Friend
chat_hobbies_1.text: You share your hobbies and dreams, and your friend listens intently. The two of you exchange ideas and make plans to explore a new hobby together. This deepens your friendship in a meaningful way.

rooftop_1.text: The wind is stronger here. You spot a crumpled note fluttering near the edge. Curiosity peaks as you reach for it. You can choose to investigate the note or ignore it and return inside.

secret_note_1.name: Narrator
secret_note_1.text: The note contains a mysterious map with cryptic symbols. Your heart races with excitement as possibilities unfold in your mind. An adventure, just for you, seems to begin here. You tuck the note into your pocket, feeling a thrill of discovery.

ignore_note_1.name: Narrator
ignore_note_1.text: You shove the note aside and return to your routine, the thrill of mystery fading quickly. The rest of the day passes normally, calm, and predictable.

ending_success.name: Narrator
ending_success.text: Ending 1: **A successful day!** You aced everything, felt accomplished, and left school with a sense of pride. Study level: {study_level}!

ending_detention.name: Narrator
ending_detention.text: Ending 2: **Caught cheating,** you spent the rest of the day in detention. The hours crawled slowly. Your study level is now: {study_level}.

ending_peaceful.name: Narrator
ending_peaceful.text: Ending 3: **Solitary Peace.** You chose to wander alone, finding quiet satisfaction in your freedom. Your friendship score is {friendship_score}.

ending_homework.name: Narrator
ending_homework.text: Ending 4: **Focused Future.** You and your friend made a plan to study, turning a skipped day into a motivation boost. Study level: {study_level}.

ending_friendship.name: Narrator
ending_friendship.text: Ending 5: **A Deep Bond.** You strengthened your friendship by sharing personal moments. Your high friendship score: {friendship_score}.

ending_adventure.name: Narrator
ending_adventure.text: Ending 6: **The Start of an Adventure.** The mysterious note set you on a new path of discovery. The flag 'has_secret_note' is {has_secret_note}. The real game begins now!

ending_normal.name: Narrator
ending_normal.text: Ending 7: **The Normal Day.** You ignored the mystery and returned to routine. Predictable, but calm. Study level: {study_level}.
